com.dtolabs.rundeck.plugins.file

Interface FileUploadPlugin


  • public interface FileUploadPlugin
    Plugin interface for handling uploaded files for job execution.
    Since:
    2/15/17

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FileUploadPlugin.ExternalState
      Represents file states known to rundeck
      static class  FileUploadPlugin.InternalState
      Represents file states known to the plugin

      Upload a file for the given job and file input name, and return an identifier to reference the uploaded file.

      • hasFile

        boolean hasFile(java.lang.String ref)
        Return true if the file can be retrieved via retrieveFile(String, OutputStream) or retrieveFile(String)
        Parameters:
        ref - ref
        Returns:
        true if the file can be retrieved, false if the retrieve call will fail
